drupalNodeEvent.title: Book Talk #2 (Special Lecture Series) : Nianshen Song

field_description.processed:
The International Center for Korean Studies of the Kyujanggak Institute for Korean Studies at Seoul National University is hosting a special lecture series, which introduces recent publications in Korean Studies to facilitate the exchange of views and information among scholars.

We will hold the second of this booktalk series via ZOOM on Friday May 14, 10AM (Seoul)/ May 13, 9PM (New York)/ May 14 2AM (London).

About the Author: Nianshen Song (University of Maryland)

About the Book: Making Borders in Modern East Asia: the Tumen River Demarcation, 1881-1919

Pre-registration Link: https://forms.gle/a7iqrYSWzofmdHiB9

Please contact icks@snu.ac.kr (Tel. 02-880-9378) for more information.
